metadata.title: CVE-2023-52819 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd: Fix UBSAN array-index-out-of-bounds for Polaris and Tonga Forpptable structs that use flexible array sizes, use flexible arrays.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.4.0-173.191~18.04.1').
linux-kvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
